English: What would you do if...
... a fire started in the kitchen?
... you woke up to the smell of smoke?
... the fire alarm of your workplace would ring?
... your child would have drunk detergent?
... your child would have eaten medication?
... your child would be unconscious on the floor?

English: ... the neighbor's dog attacked you?
... you got a wound on your head?
... you got a wound in your finger?
... someone followed you on the street?
... you saw a car accident?
... someone tried to break into your apartment?
... your friend tried to kill themselves?
Hungarian: ... a barátod öngyilkosságot kísérelt volna meg?

English: ... more and more water flooded from the toilet?
Hungarian: ... egyre több víz ömlene a vécéből?

English: ... your car's windshield broke?
... you fell and were unable to get up?

car

stove, oven
